DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the treatment of Atrial Fibrillation and ischemic Ventricular Tachycardia using a RF ablation catheter with contact force sensing capabilities.
DOC.brief_title: Study of a New Catheter Using Force Sensing Capabilities for the Treatment of Atrial Fibrillation and Ventricular Tachycardia
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic atrial fibrillation or ischemic ventricular tachycardia Longstanding persistent AF Idiopathic VT Congestive Heart Failure
